original_text: And the Lord said unto Jehu, Because thou hast done well in executing that which is right in mine eyes, and hast done unto the house of Ahab according to all that was in mine heart, thy children of the fourth generation shall sit on the throne of Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 예후에게 이르시되 네가 나보기에 정직한 일을 행하되 잘 행하여 내 마음에 있는 대로 아합 집에 다 행하였은즉 네 자손이 이스라엘 왕위를 이어 사대를 지내리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Jehu
in executing that which is right in mine eyes
and hast done unto the house of Ahab
according to all that was in mine heart
sentences.korean_translation: 내 마음에 있는 모든 것대로 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: thy children of the fourth generation
shall sit on the throne of Israel
